name: Sanitation and Water for All
goal:
Sanitation and Water for All (SWA) is a global partnership of over 150 country governments, private sector and civil society organizations, external support agencies, research and learning institutions and other development partners working together to catalyse political leadership and action, improve accountability and use scarce resources more effectively. Partners work towards a common vision of sanitation, hygiene and water (WASH) for all, always and everywhere.

The partnership is open to all countries and development partners who share SWA?s vision and seek to achieve its objectives.

Through its annual High-level Meetings, SWA has promoted dialogue on WASH within both sector ministries (Ministries of Water, Health, Rural Development and other ministries charged with extending water sanitation and hygiene services), and Ministries of Finance.
euInitiatives:
- Sanitation, water and hygiene
- Sustainable Development Goals
- International Development
